name: IOUSBHostInterface
desc: A provider object that manages interactions with an interface of the USB device.

items.name: - Open
items.desc: Opens a session to the host interface.

items.name: - Close
items.desc: Closes the session to the host interface.

items.name: - CopyConfigurationDescriptor
items.desc: Retrieves the parent configuration descriptor for this interface.

items.name: - GetInterfaceDescriptor
items.desc: Returns the version of the interface descriptor that is associated with the specified configuration.

items.name: - CopyStringDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a descriptor from the device in the specified language.

items.name: - CopyStringDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a string descriptor from the device.

items.name: - CopyPipe
items.desc: Returns the pipe for the specified endpoint address.

items.name: - CopyDevice
items.desc: Returns the host device object that contains this interface.

items.name: - DeviceRequest
items.desc: Sends a synchronous request to the device on the default control endpoint.

items.name: - AsyncDeviceRequest
items.desc: Enqueues a request on the default control endpoint of the device.

items.name: - AbortDeviceRequests
items.desc: Aborts device requests that you made previously from the current interface client.

items.name: - GetFrameNumber
items.desc: Gets the current frame number of the USB controller.

items.name: - SelectAlternateSetting
items.desc: Selects an alternative setting for this interface.

items.name: - GetIdlePolicy
items.desc: Gets the current idle suspend timeout for the interface.

items.name: - SetIdlePolicy
items.desc: Sets the desired idle suspend timeout for the interface.

items.name: - CreateIOBuffer
items.desc: Allocates a buffer for use during I/O operations.
